openblocks.yacodeblocks
Class YABlockCompiler

java.lang.Object
  openblocks.yacodeblocks.YABlockCompiler

public class YABlockCompiler
extends Object

YABlockCompiler is responsible for translating the codeblocks block structure into the Young Android Intermediate Language (YAIL)

Author:
sharon@google.com (Sharon Perl) - initial version that just generates text representation of the block structure

Parameters:

Returns:

generateYailForProject

public static String generateYailForProject(JSONObject formProperties,
                                            HashMap<String,ArrayList<RenderableBlock>> componentMap,
                                            boolean forRepl)
                                     throws YailGenerationException
Generate the Yail representation of the current Codeblocks code

Parameters:
formProperties - a JSONObject representation of the components on this form and their properties.
componentMap - a map of renderable blocks.
forRepl - true if minimizing complaints, for the Repl.
Returns:
the Yail representation
Throws:
YailGenerationException

getYailForComponentProperties

public static String getYailForComponentProperties(String formName,
                                                   JSONObject formProperties,
                                                   JSONObject jsonToWalk,
                                                   boolean includeComments)
Get the Yail expression to evaluate to set the properties of a component, and (except in the case of a form) to add the component to it parent. This code does not recurse into the subcomponents. The callers of this procedure need to do the recursion.

Parameters:
formName - The name of the form that contains the component
formProperties - a JSON description of the form
jsonToWalk - a JSON description of this component
includeComments - a boolean saying whether top include the block comments in the code as Yail comments
Returns:
the Yail code as a string

generateYailClearForm

public static String generateYailClearForm()

packageNameFromPath

public static String packageNameFromPath(String path)
Converts a path of the form gibberish/src/com/gmail/username/project1/Form.extension into package names of the form com.gmail.username.project1.Form

Parameters:
path - the path to convert.
Returns:
a dot separated package name.
